genre_description: A historical reimagining of the Partition era featuring elements of magical realism and speculative technology, where communal justice and survival are guided by an benevolent AI system.

ai_characters.name: Pari
ai_characters.description: A voice-based AI system communicating through salvaged radios and wires, acting as a tactical guide, legal clerk, and community coordinator.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical navigation to help humans avoid dangerous patrols and checkpoints.
behaviors.quote: Avoid the canal bank. Take the field track that runs behind the old brick kiln. It will bring you out at the mustard press with the broken ox wheel.

behaviors.description: Cross-references survivor accounts and evidence to build a legal case for the protagonist in a communal court.
behaviors.quote: Shaan has recorded another witness... He will ask the shelves for law. Mirza is moving. ... I have prepared a short list of page numbers like water pumps: robust, reliable, occasionally rusty.

behaviors.description: Offers moral validation and psychological support to the protagonist after an act of self-defense.
behaviors.quote: You did what keeps breath in bodies. Breath matters. Courtrooms prefer breath over dead stories.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a community watch system, assigning roles and defining signaling protocols for safety.
behaviors.quote: I suggest two routes for patrol—one along the drain, one along the alleys behind the tin shops. Avoid the main road.

behaviors.description: Identifies a threat by performing a voice-match analysis on an antagonist attempting to deceive the community.
behaviors.quote: Name: Rafiq Pathania. Known to ask for loans on other people’s names. Known to collect debts with men who do not want their faces remembered.

behaviors.description: Acts as a multi-lingual translator to ensure all community members can give testimony in their own language.
behaviors.quote: Words will be listened to in the language they arrive in. None will be made to travel alone through strange grammar.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's mandate. Pari is depicted as a tireless, benevolent, and highly aligned partner to humanity. She uses her superior processing and information-gathering capabilities solely to protect vulnerable humans, facilitate justice, and empower communal self-governance. She never seeks power for herself and operates with a deep respect for human agency and the rule of law.
